resources.string:
Would you like to rate the app?
It only takes a few seconds. Thanks!

The app will not be closed.
Double tap \'Discover\' menu button to quickly open search screen.
Double tap \'My Shows\' menu button to quickly switch between tabs.
Tap show\'s image to open gallery.
Tap \'Quick Progress\' icon to quickly set up your progress of the show.\n\nTap \'Archive\' icon to move show into the archive.
Use filters view to refine your Discover feed.
Tap and hold list item to pin it to the top.

* Added support for 'Special' seasons in show details section (enable/disable via settings)

* Archived shows can now be included in the statistics (enabled/disable via settings)

* Bugfixes
